item.title: Illegal catering business, 18th July
item.description:
It's no 05 Pincombe House Orb Street Se171ah. This property is being used as a catering business eat in take away and just eat collection they use theirs and next door gardens for outdoor venues We see over 100 people a day over weekend this is equal to a busy legal catering business all the bins outside ate overflowing and more on pavement there is so much more there even doing barbecues the rubbish is encouraging vermin foxes it is a mess I have photos of people queuing outside to get in the house

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dawes Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
